Text:
Please guys i would really like someone to help me out here, i love DK books and would like to get the following, so if you have them do upload, they are;
1) Military History: The Definitive Visual Guide to the Objects of Warfare
2) History: From the Dawn of Civilization to the Present Day
3) Timelines of History 
4)Myths & Legends: An illustrated guide to their origins and meanings
5) World Religions: The Great Faiths Explored & Explained 
6)Universe: The Definitive Visual Guide
I have been looking forever for these books but had no luck finding them, somebody make my wish come true and upload all or some of these beautiful books.
